item.title: [PI] New Torva Helm Fix [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Master_CoderZ Master CoderZ
item.description:
@Master_CoderZ wrote:

Well alot of people have asked this so here it is…

THIS FIX FOR THE HALF HELMET IN INVENTORY
SHOW ONLY HALF BUT ADD ALL THIS AND IT WILL LOOK LIKE THE PICTURE BELOW

case 20135: itemDef.modelID = 67442; itemDef.name = "Torva full helm"; itemDef.description = "Torva full helm"; itemDef.modelZoom = 724; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 81; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 1670; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset2 = -28; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 66475; itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 66858; itemDef.groundActions = new String[5]; itemDef.groundActions[2] = "Take"; itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.actions[2] = "Check-charges"; itemDef.actions[4] = "Drop"; break;
     Download Models
     [url=https://dl.dropbox.com/u/101314886/Torva%20Helm.bmp]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/101314886/Torva%20Helm.bmp[/url]
